mainHero.title: Drogheria Conti
mainHero.subtitle: Italian excellence since 1930
mainHero.description: Welcome to Drogheria Conti, your reference point in Rome for organic products and gourmet specialties. Alessandro and Sandra await you with a unique selection of food, wines, sweets, teas and more. Discover the real taste of Italy, where passion, tradition and quality meet!

items.title: Organic Products
items.description: At our store, you’ll find only the finest certified organic products, selected with care and passion. Our range includes Italian packaged foods made with natural, traceable, and sustainable ingredients. Perfect for those who value quality, authentic flavor, and a healthier lifestyle.

items.title: Wines and Spirits
items.description: A journey through the flavors of Italy… and beyond. Our wine cellar offers a wide selection of local wines, carefully chosen from small and medium Italian wineries, alongside rare international labels and high-end artisanal spirits from around the world. Ideal for enthusiasts, collectors, or anyone looking for a truly special gift.

items.title: Teas and Herbal Infusions
items.description: A moment of relaxation for every part of your day. Our selection of teas, infusions, and herbal blends is one of the most diverse in Rome: from classic black teas to delicate Japanese green teas, from wellness herbal blends to fragrant fruity and floral varieties. A choice for every taste, every season, and every need.

features.title: Where to find us
features.subtitle: In the heart of Rome
features.description: You can find us at Via dei Giubbonari 55, just steps from Campo de' Fiori. We are easily reachable on foot or by public transport. Come and enjoy a true Italian taste and tradition experience!

sections.name: About us
sections.content: Drogheria Conti was born from the passion of Alessandro and Sandra for good food and genuine quality. For over 90 years, we have been a landmark in Rome for those who seek authentic products and a warm, welcoming service.
